name: Acid Rain (iamdudeman)
description: This game was built as a submission for the One Lone Coder Codejam 2022. It is the first real test of a custom Java 2D game engine I am working on. The goal of the game engine is to utilize no outside libraries to force myself to learn more about how games are made (plus it is a lot of fun!). I worked on this game with a few good buddies I met long ago in college who are also interested in making little games in their free time. We call ourselves "Duck Dudes Games" and we hope you enjoy our first completed project!
